primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To deposit funds via wire transfer on Ndax (web):

  1. After logging in, you'll be redirected to your dashboard.
  2. Click Deposit at the top of the page.
  3. Select Wire Transfer.
    - If depositing USD, first choose United States Dollar, then click Receive.
  4. Copy the banking details provided.
  5. Use this information to send a wire transfer from your online banking or in-branch with your financial institution.
  6. After sending the wire, scroll down and click Upload a Receipt.
  7. Enter your full name and the amount exactly as shown on your wire receipt.
  8. Upload a copy of the wire transfer receipt.
  9. Click Submit to complete the process.

ðŸ’¡ Wire deposits typically arrive in your Ndax CAD wallet within 0â€“1 business day, provided all details match.
